definitions.definition: To raise something or someone to a higher physical , social , moral , intellectual , spiritual or emotional level .

subdefinitions.definition: To raise (a nonsentient species) into sentience .

definitions.definition: To be accepted for carriage on a flight.
To remove (a child) from a damaging home environment by a social welfare organization.
To remove (a document ) from its current possessor and take it into one's own possession .

main_definition: To raise something or someone to a higher physical , social , moral , intellectual , spiritual or emotional level .
secondary_definitions: ( law , of a penalty ) To aggravate ; to increase .
( aviation , travel ) To be accepted for carriage on a flight.
( New Zealand ) To remove (a child) from a damaging home environment by a social welfare organization.
( law , Australia , transitive ) To remove (a document ) from its current possessor and take it into one's own possession .
